name: Trilium Notes
description: Hierarchical note-taking application focused on building large personal knowledge bases.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  trilium:
    image: zadam/trilium:latest
    container_name: trilium
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - TRILIUM_DATA_DIR=/home/node/trilium-data
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:8080"
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/home/node/trilium-data
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=trilium"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=productivity"

notes: First access will create initial setup
Supports markdown, code blocks, and diagrams
